languages.text: "Префект-вычислителю повелели ограничить круг допущенных к командованию лиц, исключив даже высокопоставленных техножрецов других кораблей. Ему приказали охранять обсерваториум, словно ждали врагов. И наше с ним знакомство напоминало скорее обмен секретными паролями".

"The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."
languages.original_text: "Префект-вычислителю повелели ограничить круг допущенных к командованию лиц, исключив даже высокопоставленных техножрецов других кораблей. Ему приказали охранять обсерваториум, словно ждали врагов. И наше с ним знакомство напоминало скорее обмен секретными паролями".

traits.locale_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, to the exclusion of even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. They tasked it with defending the observatorium as though they were expecting enemies. Our mutual introduction rather resembled exchanging secret passwords."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, to the exclusion of even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. They tasked it with defending the observatorium as though they were expecting enemies. Our mutual introduction rather resembled exchanging secret passwords."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「監督列挙子は、指令を取り消せる人数を制限する命令を受けていました。他の船にいる高位の技術司祭にさえ適用されていたのです。監督列挙子には包囲下にあるかのように、観察室を守る任務が課せられました。互いに自己紹介をしたというよりは、秘密のパスワードを交換したという方が近い」
languages.original_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: 「監督列挙子は、指令を取り消せる人数を制限する命令を受けていました。他の船にいる高位の技術司祭にさえ適用されていたのです。監督列挙子には包囲下にあるかのように、観察室を守る任務が課せられました。互いに自己紹介をしたというよりは、秘密のパスワードを交換したという方が近い」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “统领计算器只接受特定人员的命令，其中包括来自其他飞船的高级技术神甫，这部分人员有严格的数量限制。它的任务是严密保护瞭望台，而我们之间的相互介绍其实更像是交换数据密码。”
languages.original_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: “统领计算器只接受特定人员的命令，其中包括来自其他飞船的高级技术祭司，这部分人员有严格的数量限制。它的任务是严密保护瞭望台，而我们之间的相互介绍其实更像是交换数据密码。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le préfet enumerator a reçu l'ordre de limiter le nombre de personnes autorisées à donner des ordres, incluant les technoprêtres de rang élevé issus d'autres vaisseaux. Il a été chargé de défendre l'observatorium comme s'il était en état de siège. Notre introduction était plus de l'ordre d'un échange de mots de passe que de véritables présentations. »
languages.original_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: « Le préfet enumerator a reçu l'ordre de limiter le nombre de personnes autorisées à donner des ordres, incluant les technoprêtres de rang élevé issus d'autres vaisseaux. Il a été chargé de défendre l'observatorium comme s'il était en état de siège. Notre introduction était plus de l'ordre d'un échange de mots de passe que de véritables présentations. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Al Enumerador de Prefectos se le ordenó limitar la cantidad de gente con autorización para emitir órdenes, incluso los tecnosacerdotes de alto rango de otras naves. Se le encomendó defender el observatorium como si estuviera bajo asedio. Al presentarnos, parece que más bien hemos intercambiado contraseñas secretas».
languages.original_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: «Al Enumerador de Prefectos se le ordenó limitar la cantidad de gente con autorización para emitir órdenes, incluso los tecnosacerdotes de alto rango de otras naves. Se le encomendó defender el observatorium como si estuviera bajo asedio. Al presentarnos, parece que más bien hemos intercambiado contraseñas secretas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Präfekt Enumerator wurde angewiesen, die Anzahl der Personen einzuschränken, die Befehle erteilen dürfen. Selbst hochrangige Techpriester anderer Schiffe wurden ausgeschlossen. Er wurde angewiesen, das Observatorium zu verteidigen, als stünde es unter Belagerung. Unsere gegenseitige Vorstellung glich eher einem Austausch geheimer Passwörter."
languages.original_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: "Der Präfekt Enumerator wurde angewiesen, die Anzahl der Personen einzuschränken, die Befehle erteilen dürfen. Selbst hochrangige Techpriester anderer Schiffe wurden ausgeschlossen. Er wurde angewiesen, das Observatorium zu verteidigen, als stünde es unter Belagerung. Unsere gegenseitige Vorstellung glich eher einem Austausch geheimer Passwörter."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Prefekt Sayaç'a, emir verme yetkisine sahip kişilerin sayısını sınırlama komutu verilmiş. Diğer gemilerin üst rütbeli Tekno Rahipleri de buna dâhil edilmiş. Gözlemhaneyi kuşatma altındaymışçasına savunmakla görevlendirilmiş. Birbirimizi karşılıklı olarak tanıtmamız, daha çok kutsal parolaların el değiştirmesini andırıyordu."
languages.original_text: "The Prefect Enumerator was commanded to limit the number of people who have clearance to issue orders, including even high-ranking Tech-Priests from other ships. It was tasked with defending the observatorium as if it were under siege. Our mutual introduction rather resembled an exchange of secret passwords."

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt Sayaç'a, emir verme yetkisine sahip kişilerin sayısını sınırlama komutu verilmiş ve buna diğer gemilerden gelen üst rütbeli Tekno Rahipler bile dâhil. Gözlemhaneyi kuşatma altındaymışcasına savunmakla görevlendirilmiş. Birbirimizi karşılıklı olarak tanıtmamız, daha çok kutsal parolaların el değiştirmesini andırıyordu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
